org.openimaj.ml.clustering.spectral

Class AbsoluteValueEigenChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.clustering.spectral.EigenChooser
      • org.openimaj.ml.clustering.spectral.AbsoluteValueEigenChooser

  • public class AbsoluteValueEigenChooser
extends EigenChooser
    Attempts to automatically choose the number of eigen vectors based on the comparative value of the eigen value with the first eigen value seen.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
